see 0.1.0

The easystats' minimal theme

Source: R/theme_modern.R
theme_modern.Rd

A modern, sleek and elegant theme for ggplot.

theme_modern(legend.position = "right", axis.title.space = 20,
  legend.title.size = "none", legend.text.size = 13,
  axis.title.size = 13, axis.title.face = "plain",
  axis.text.size = NULL)

Arguments

legend.position

the position of legends ("none", "left", "right", "bottom", "top", or two-element numeric vector)
axis.title.space

Axis title spacing.
legend.title.size

Legend elements text size in pts.
legend.text.size

Legend elements text size in pts.
axis.title.size

Axis title text size in pts.
axis.title.face

Font face ("plain", "italic", "bold", "bold.italic").
axis.text.size

Axis text size in pts.

Examples

library(ggplot2)
library(see)

ggplot(iris, aes(x = Sepal.Width, y = Sepal.Length, color = Species)) +
  geom_point() +
  theme_modern()

Contents

  • Examples
